about_the_game:
The hypno romp with girls with curves returns!

Critical Bliss and Outbreak Games join forces to deliver you Snow Daze: Redaze, an ambitious reimagining of Snow Daze: Music Of Winter. This REMAKE is made completely from the ground up with brand-new dynamic visuals, stylish artwork, and a greatly refined narrative experience.



Relive a familiar setting with a revolutionary approach to visual novel scene presentation. Snow Daze: Redaze adopts a manga-like style with a variety of artwork to add more meat to every scene in fantastic detail. A newly introduced system allows deeper narrative dialogue when interacting with the characters. It won't be as easy to get the girls to fulfil Jason's fantasies, but the rewards are beyond his wildest dreams!

Features


Over 200+ individuals Images
4k resolution support
Fully voice acted scenes
Multiple endings
Dynamic conversation system
Timeline and Recollection System
Extras & secrets
Brand new OST made by the Critical Bliss Sound Team
Steam achievements

content_descriptors.notes: This game has adult themes, adult language, references to the occult, and fictional characters depicted in adult situations and performing hardcore sexual acts with human and fantasy characters. All characters depicted are over the age of 18.

short_description: Critical Bliss and Outbreak Games join forces to deliver a retelling of the original hypno romp! You play as Jason, a fledgling musician who has strange desires for his family. Unable to keep his lust in check, Jason comes up with a plan to hypnotize all the voluptuous women in the house.
